musictree.quarterduration

musictree.quarterduration.BEATWISE_EXCEPTIONS = {0: {5: (3, 2), 6: (6,)}}

{offset: {quarter_duration: return value(s), … }, …}

musictree.quarterduration.is_writable(quarter_duration: Union[float, int, quicktions.Fraction, musictree.quarterduration.QuarterDuration])[source]

Function to check if a quarter duration is writable or must be split into two durations.

Parameters

quarter_duration –

Returns

boolean

>>> is_writable(5)
False
>>> is_writable(7/8)
False
>>> is_writable(3/8)
True
class musictree.quarterduration.QuarterDuration(*value)[source]

Bases: numbers.Rational

A Class specifically designed for durations measured in quarters. The core of this class is a value of type quicktions.Fraction with a denominator limit of 1000, thus it can manage conversion of floats to fractions without usual inaccuracies of quintuples etc. See value property for more information. QuarterDuration has all needed magic methods for numeral comparison and conversion.

property numerator
Returns

Fraction’s numerator.

Return type

int

>>> QuarterDuration(1, 6).numerator
1
property denominator
Returns

Fraction’s denominator.

Return type

int

>>> QuarterDuration(1, 6).denominator
6
property value
Returns

QuarterDuration’s value

Return type

quicktions.Fraction() with limit_denominator(1000)

>>> QuarterDuration(3, 7).value
Fraction(3, 7)
>>> QuarterDuration(0.2).value
Fraction(1, 5)
>>> QuarterDuration(Fraction(1, 5)).value
Fraction(1, 5)
>>> QuarterDuration(1/5).value
Fraction(1, 5)
as_integer_ratio()[source]
Returns

(numinator, denominator)

Return type

tuple

>>> QuarterDuration(1, 5).as_integer_ratio()
(1, 5)
get_beatwise_sections(beats: List[Beat], offset: Union[int, float, QuarterDuration, Fraction] = 0)[source]
Parameters

  • beats –

  • offset – offset in the first beat

Returns

[sections as list of QuarterDurations, left_over as QuarterDruation] left_over is the remaining quarter_duration which exceeds the sum of all beats quarter durations. If there is no left over the second value in the list is None. offset=0.5, beats=[Beat(1), Beat(1), Beat(1), Beat(1)] => [[0.5, 3], None] See tests for more examples. In BEATWISE_EXCEPTIONS exceptions can be declared.

class musictree.quarterduration.QuarterDurationMixin(quarter_duration=None)[source]

Bases: object

Mixin for all Classes with a quarter_duration. Used in Note, Chord and Beat
